message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. I understand its significance and am confident it will serve your needs exceptionally well. Considering the product's worth to you, I am offering it to you for $950,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure you receive a fair deal while maximizing the value I receive for this exceptional item. I believe this offer strikes a balance between our interests and presents a favorable transaction for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
